task.title: Disassociating a child component
task.shortdesc: When the parent-child relationship between the components is not valid, then you can disassociate the child component from the parent component. You can then either make the child component as a child to another component or delete the child component.

taskbody.prereq: You must have a child component.

info.p: The System Model page is displayed.

step.cmd: Click the component for which you want to remove the child component.

info.p: The component details are displayed in the right pane.

step.cmd: Select the child component listed in the Children section.

info.note: The Edit and Delete icons are enabled for this child component.

step.cmd: Complete the steps for the task that you want to perform as listed in the following table:

strow.stentry: Associate this child component to another parent

ol.li:
Click the Edit icon.
The Change parent dialog box is displayed.
Select a parent from the list, and then click Change.

taskbody.result: You have disassociated the child component from the parent component.
